scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install || echo 'Frontend not ready yet'
scripts.dev:frontend: cd frontend && npm run dev || echo 'Frontend not installed yet. Run npm run dev:backend to start backend only.'
scripts.start:frontend: cd frontend && npm run build && npm run preview
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.build:backend: echo 'Backend does not require build step'
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:backend: cd backend && npm test || echo 'No backend tests configured'
scripts.test:frontend: cd frontend && npm test || echo 'No frontend tests configured'
